remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件, 以自定义单元值到适合显示的格式的转换, 或根据其状态或值自定义单元格的外观。Handle the event to customize the conversion of a cell value into a format suitable for display or to customize the appearance of a cell depending on its state or value. 每次绘制每个单元格时都会发生此事件, 因此, 在处理此事件时应避免冗长的处理。The event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event. 当检索单元格或调用其方法时, 也会发生此事件。This event also occurs when the cell is retrieved or its method is called. 处理事件时 , 将用单元值初始化属性。When you handle the event, the property is initialized with the cell value. 如果提供了从单元值到显示值的自定义转换, 请将属性设置为转换后的值, 确保新值的类型为 cell 属性指定的类型。If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell property. 若要指示不需要进一步设置值格式, 请将属性设置`true`为。To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the property to `true`. 当事件处理程序完成时, 如果为`null`或不是正确的类型, 或者属性为`false`, 则使用、 、 和格式化。由属性返回的单元格样式的属性, 该属性是使用 cell 属性进行初始化的。 When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is formatted using the , , , and properties of the cell style returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 无论属性的值如何, 都将使用属性返回的对象的显示属性来呈现单元。Regardless of the value of the property, the display properties of the object returned by the property are used to render the cell. 有关使用事件进行自定义格式设置的详细信息[, 请参阅如何:自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)中的数据格式设置。For more information about custom formatting using the event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要避免在处理此事件时性能受到影响, 请通过事件处理程序的参数而不是直接访问单元来访问单元。To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly. 若要自定义格式的、用户指定的值到实际单元值的转换, 请处理事件。To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information
